original_text: When Jesus had finished speaking to his apostles, God took him up to heaven. The apostles watched Jesus while he went up. Then a cloud hid him and they could not see him any more.
korean_text: 이 말씀을 마치시고 그들이 보는데 올려져 가시니 구름이 그를 가리어 보이지 않게 하더라

sentences.original_text: When Jesus had finished speaking to his apostles
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 자신의 사도들에게 말씀을 마치셨을 때

sentences.original_text: God took him up to heaven
and they could not see him any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 더 이상 그를 볼 수 없었다
